Alaris.Irc.CommandBuilderCommandBuilder provides the support methods needed by its subclasses to build correctly formatted messages for the IRC server. It is never itself instantiated
Alaris.Exceptions.ConfigFileInvalidExceptionException thrown when an invalid config file is detected
Alaris.Irc.ConnectionThis class manages the connection to the IRC server and provides access to all the objects needed to send and receive messages
Alaris.Irc.ConnectionArgsA collection of parameters necessary to establish an IRC connection
Alaris.Extras.CrashHandlerA class providing functions to run specific method in an exception-handled environment
Alaris.Irc.Ctcp.CtcpListenerThis class is used to send CTCP specific events. Once registered with this object the client can receive notification of all CTCP requests, pings, and replies. Instances of this class are not created directly but are retrieved as a property from a Connection object
Alaris.Irc.Ctcp.CtcpResponderA class which automatically responds to CTCP queries. The replies it sends are configurable by the client
Alaris.Irc.Ctcp.CtcpSenderThis class allows the client to send CTCP commands. There is no limit on what commands can actually be sent, however, the accepted CTCP commands are: UserInfo, Finger, Version, Source, ClientInfo, ErrMsg, and Time
Alaris.Irc.Ctcp.CtcpUtilConstants and utility methods to support CTCP
Alaris.Threading.CThreadPoolA simple Thread pool implementation
Alaris.Extras.DatabaseManager
Alaris.Irc.Dcc.DccChatSessionEstablish a DCC Chat connection with a remote user
Alaris.Irc.Dcc.DccFileInfoManages the information about the file being transfered
Alaris.Irc.Dcc.DccFileSessionAllows the user to send and receive files from other IRC users
Alaris.Irc.Dcc.DccFileSessionManagerThis class checks each file session to see if it has not had any activity within the timeout period so that inactive sessions can be closed
Alaris.Irc.Dcc.DccListenerDccListener listens for incoming DCC requests on any Connection in which DCC is enabled. This class follows the singleton pattern and there so there is only a single instance which listens to all connections
Alaris.Irc.Dcc.DccUserInfoThis class encapsulates all the information known about a remote user in the context of a DCC session
Alaris.Irc.Dcc.DccUtilUtility methods needed to handle DCC requests

Alaris.Irc.IdentdAn Ident daemon is still used by some IRC networks for authentication. It is a simple service which when queried by a remote system returns a username. The server is controlled via static methods all of which are Thread safe
Alaris.Irc.IParserClasses should implement this Interface in order to act as custom parsers for the raw messages received from IRC servers
Alaris.API.IrcConstantsClass holding some constant values for IRC

Alaris.Core.LogLogging class used all across Alaris
Alaris.LuaEngine.LuaEngineClass used to load Lua script files. This script engine is an optional one and can be disabled by commenting a single line of code
Alaris.LuaEngine.LuaFunctionAttributeAttribute used to mark functions which are exposed to the Lua VM
Alaris.LuaEngine.LuaFunctionDescriptorClass used to describe and register Lua functions. Mainly related to attribute-based registering
Alaris.LuaEngine.LuaFunctionsClass containing most of the exported Lua functions. It as also a wrapper to the Main API
Alaris.LuaEngine.LuaHelperHelper functions for the LuaEngine implementation
Atom.Core.MainAlternateLinkMissingExceptionThe exception that is thrown when the main link with alternate relationship is not inserted
Alaris.Irc.NameGeneratorGenerates random, made-up names. The names appear to be language neutral (sort of)
Atom.Core.OnlyOneMultipartContentAllowedExceptionThe exception that is thrown when a more than one multipart content is inserted in an entry
Atom.Core.RequiredAttributeNotFoundExceptionThe exception that is thrown when a required attribute is not found in the feed or entry
